apple_vendor_description: This touching emoji, rendered on Apple devices with the medium-dark and medium skin tones, portrays a loving couple embraced by a prominent heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the figures and the heart a warm, inviting glow, enhanced by the smooth rounded edges of their forms. On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic love, strong partnerships, and deep affection, conveying a sense of unity and cherished connection in digital communication.
